name: Fragmento (Meloniishi)
description:
In the depths of AMANI’s eternal memory, a certain young girl named Susie left a haunting mark. She lived a sheltered and secluded life, surrounded by thick fog from the forest and clouded by her father’s emotional turmoil. She dreams of another world that offers reprieve from her stunted reality. AMANI discovers Susie's imagined world and comes to understand what she has experienced in the mysterious world known as Fragmento.

WARNING

This demo contains references to child neglect and abuse. Be advised and take care of yourself.

FYI: This game is extremely short :P

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move

Enter/Return - Interact

ESC - Menu

My first experiment using the program RPG Maker MV, created in 3 months as a part of Sunset Micro Wave, Issue 6.
